dct_title_s: Le Paraguay, où les R.R.P.P. de la Compagnie de Jesus ont répandu leurs missions
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. In upper margin: Tom. 9, pag. 254. Probably issued in: Lettres édifiantes et curieuses ... Paris : Chez J. G. Merigot, 1780-1783. Shows sites of Jesuit missions, including villages and missions which were destroyed. Historic Maps copy has hand-lettered label of map verso: No. 9. Cartes pour les lettres edifiantes. Le Paragay, T. IX. 254.
